title: Inner-loop script to do an incremental build
body:
Currently, build automation scripts are focused on CI scenarios, and doing a full `Rebuild` is good for consistency in that scenario. But when debugging, it can be nice to have a minimal rebuild--just build, no tests, no forced rebuild.

This could be a param to `cibuild.{sh,cmd}`.

nodes.body: Our build has been overhauled twice since I filed this. `build.cmd` is currently incremental by default, I think.
